org.apache.polygene.api.mixin

Interface Initializable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlarmStatus.AlarmStatusMixin, JavaxJsonAdapters.Mixin, JavaxJsonDeserializer, JavaxJsonFactories.Mixin, JavaxJsonSerializer, JavaxXmlAdapters.Mixin, JavaxXmlDeserializer, JavaxXmlFactories.Mixin, JavaxXmlSerializer, MessagePackAdapters.Mixin, RequestWriterDelegator, ResponseReaderDelegator, ServiceCircuitBreakerMixin

    public interface Initializable
    Fragments which want to be initialized can implement this callback interface. It will be invoked after the fragment has bee instantiated and all injections have been done.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialize()
      Initialize the fragment

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize()
         throws Exception
        Initialize the fragment
        Throws:
        Exception - if something went wrong
